Rulings.Cat: ● If you chain a Quick-Play Spell or a Normal or Counter Trap Card targeted by the effect of “Raiza the Storm Monarch,” it will not be returned to the top of its owner’s Deck.

Rulings.Base: 1. If you chain a Quick-Play Spell or a Normal or Counter Trap Card targeted by the effect of "Raiza the Storm Monarch", it will not be returned to the top of its owner's Deck.
